name: ttyd-alphine
short_description: Share your terminal over the web — runs a bash shell in Alpine Linux accessible from any browser.
description: Share your terminal over the web — runs a bash shell in Alpine Linux accessible from any browser. ttyd-alphine is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, pastebin, sharing. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host ttyd-alphine on your home server to share your terminal over the web — runs a bash shell in alpine linux accessible from any browser without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use ttyd-alphine to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
